headline: A Fresh Look at Prologis (PLD) Valuation After Analyst Upgrades and Stronger Growth Outlook
summary: Prologis (PLD) just landed a decisive vote of confidence from Wall Street, as Bank of America Securities upgraded the stock to "Buy," citing its robust leasing pipeline and improving demand-supply dynamics in the industrial real estate market. The analyst momentum, combined with recent consensus “Outperform” ratings and positive earnings estimate revisions, has quickly brightened the spotlight on Prologis as its October earnings call approaches. For investors weighing action, these upgrades...
